Reviews.Title: “Beware of bed bugs!”
Reviews.Author: Bibi R
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights time barcelona hostel close ramblas metro sites supermarket type eats free walking tour huge tip tour guide okso night okit wasnt 3rd day awoke water dripping bed contacted receptionist sit 3 hours told fixed move wait till checks didnt spend day barcelona waiting till checked move stuff smell water absolutely disgusting hold believe toilet clothes wet moving laundrymat wash clothes time day complained receptionist told speak manager day compensated 10 euros laundry offer reimburse night heres worst parti bed night couldnt sleepi crawling sensation itching half woke upi welts bugs didnt complain didnt water issue reason average location free walking tour terms roomi poor service

Reviews.Title: “Good, small hostel in the centre”

Reviews.Content: stayed 3 girls 4 nights nice time hostel didnt people stayed hostel clean bathroom shower bath private bathroom ensuite hostel close rambla restaurants centre recommend pub crawl lot fun breakfast basic coffee tea bread ham cheese free 2 computers downstairs free internet barcelona city stay hostel day towels linen included towels day recommend hostel friends staying barca days meet people hostel perfect

Reviews.Content: ramblas definitly hostel hotel hostel comparing horrible hostels europe location hostels street mini supermarkets atms cheap souvenir shops bars beautiful palau güell hostel situated literally 5 minutes walking famous las ramblas easily plaça reial plaça de catalunya la boqueria barri port vell avinguda del rambla del raval etc night street busy loud pubs hostels windows double glass night sleep theres excellent access public transports metro buses taxis bedrooms bedroom ensuite doable bedrooms balcony excellent natural light flat tv air conditioning free internet linen towels clean everyday towels linen changed everyday anyway towels linen clean everyday found stains little hairs sheets concerned bathroom shower day unfortunately found 3 cockroaches running dont window disgusting breakfast people liked breakfast people dont didnt regards quantity variety everyday breakfast 930am eat variety am fancy breakfast hostel 1 2 added breakfast achieve classic expression gowe stop eat able start walks city lockers ramblas lockers luggage check flight home 6pm luggage 2€ final walk barcelona luggage locker unless pay 2€ grab belongings staff staff polite helpful little tv reception quickly fixed moment arrive checkin staff reception charge ready pay cash info elevator starts floor stairs luggage time leave hostel key reception bit expensive hostel perfectly located explore city maybe hostels prices conditions matter looking hostels compare flaws ramblas awful doable improvements am average hotel hostel david dinner restaurant hostels spanish experience

Reviews.Title: “Lovely place to stay!”
Reviews.Author: PeachLAmour
Reviews.Content: lovely stay booked hostel site expected bogstandard pleasantly surprised clean towels bedding day shared bathroom cleaned day breakfasts basic diy job provided bread cheese jam mornings pretty strict cleaned managed despite love lie location close las ramblas expected little street close indeed loved gothic quarter gaudis palace created guell street walls little thin werent evening anyway wasnt issue free walking tours bearings overall stay explore beautiful city budget

Reviews.Title: “Nearest think a hostel can be to a hotel.”

Reviews.Content: lovely hostel pros safe location clean modern free breakfast internet quiet location cons expense hostel lot cheaper city center hotel staff key time left strange pay nights front cash bit nuisance overall hostel quiet central base explore city bit quiet expensive looking lads weekend trip

Reviews.Content: weve rented double bed private hotel reason choose noisy surroundings computers stuff friendly managed time barcelona decide choose hostel

Reviews.Title: “definitely one of the best budget hostel”
Reviews.Author: Courla
Reviews.Content: dodgy cuz hookers corner little worse block north hotel central barcelona apart unpleasant streets mentioned awesome 5 minutes walk name service absolutely lame receptionist instance 100 entire stay upfront wont accept cards payment normally comes handy 4 nights booking 7 friends breakfast ok night youre starving otherwise plain tasteless hostel food apart rate low nice clean pretty quiet hostel shared bathroom modern clean surprisingly free overall value im talking stayed dozens cheap hostels barcelona

Reviews.Title: “Clean & comfortable”
